main.name: Tim Baker
main.description: Here will be your description. Use this to describe what you do or whatever you feel best describes yourself to a potential employer
main.bio: Use this bio section as your way of describing yourself and saying what you do, what technologies you like to use or feel most comfortable with, describing your personality, or whatever else you feel like throwing in.
main.contactmessage: Have a project for me? Think I'd be a good fit for your team? I'd love to hear from you, give me a shout by email or call me.

resume.skillmessage: Develop Web development using HTML, SCSS, JavaScript, ReactJs, Java.

education.degree: Bachelors in Computer Science, Software Engineering Option
education.description: Here I took my Bachelors of Computer Science with a Software Engineering Specialty and achieved a much more thorough education in the underlying theory, concepts, and science behind more complex programming,  learn communication skills and teamwork skills. It was here that I discovered my passion for scalable application programming web and mobile application.

work.title: Intern
work.description: Here I am in charge of various tasks related to the management website design. I have participated in projects for customers including technologies: Reactjs, ant design, mongoDB.

testimonials.text: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. And the only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle. As with all matters of the heart, you'll know when you find it.
